title: Condensed Sans
content:
Can anyone tell me what this typeface is?

[http://theofficeof.feltron.com/#29101/Print-Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220325/http:/theofficeof.feltron.com/#29101/Print-Magazine "http://theofficeof.feltron.com/#29101/Print-Magazine")
author: joelmiller

comments.content:
[Opti Giant](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220325/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40903), not commercially available anymore.  
Alternatives here: [Compressed Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220325/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/skyline_sans/)
